backend/main.mo: Main canister actor implementing access control, blob storage mixins, user profiles, and full CRUD for FacebookOutreachEntry including leadContactInfo and sorting helpers.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting stored FacebookOutreachEntry records by adding the new leadContactInfo field with a default empty string.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the leadContactInfo addition and affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their responsibilities and components.
frontend/docs/live-smoke-test.md: Manual smoke‑test checklist for validating anonymous‑mode functionality and dashboard behavior in the live environment.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens for global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React component configuring theme, React Query, layout, and view switching between dashboard and hook library.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DaysSi: Dashboard card that groups entries by URL, calculates days since most recent post, and displays them in a table with color‑coded indicators.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/EventT: Displays inquiry counts by event type, sorted and ranked, with a no‑data message fallback.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Follow: Shows Facebook outreach entries requiring follow‑up today with edit actions and group info.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Succes: Renders a bar chart of groups sorted by successful engagements with a no‑data fallback.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Winnin: Lists posts with more than five comments, sorted by engagement, or shows an empty state.
frontend/src/components/entries/DeleteEn: Confirmation dialog for deleting an outreach entry using mutation hooks with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntriesT: Displays a detailed table of outreach entries with actions, status badges, and delete confirmation handling.
frontend/src/components/entries/entryCat: Defines craft category options and a helper to map category enums to display labels.
frontend/src/components/entries/entryEve: Provides event type options and a label lookup for event type enums.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntryFor: Dialog form for creating or editing outreach entries with validation, image handling, and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/entries/entryFor: Contains simple validators for URLs and non‑negative numeric values.
frontend/src/components/entries/entryInt: Defines interest type options and a function to get readable labels for them.
frontend/src/components/entries/ImageUpl: React component for selecting, previewing, replacing, and clearing an uploaded image with optional existing image display.
frontend/src/components/entries/response: Maps response status enums to display labels and style class strings.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with header, navigation, content container, and footer including smoke‑test link.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminTokenActor.ts: Creates an anonymous actor initialized with an admin token from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnonymousActor.ts: Creates and exposes a backend actor for fully anonymous access.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthorizedActor.ts: Determines auth mode (authenticated, admin token, anonymous) and selects the correct actor with readiness signals.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Checks backend health using the authorized actor with retries and short cache time.
frontend/src/hooks/useHookTemplateLibrar: Fetches and saves hook templates scoped to the current auth context via React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, state, and AuthClient initialization.
Defines React Query mutation hooks for creating, updating, deleting, and saving notes for outreach entries using an authorized backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useOutreachQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching outreach-related data such as entries, follow-ups, summaries, notes, and inquiry stats.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark mode CSS variables for the app’s color system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Implements the main dashboard showing outreach data, charts, follow-ups, and entry management with backend health checks.
frontend/src/pages/HookTemplateLibraryPa: Provides a page for viewing, editing, copying, and saving hook templates with backend health handling.
frontend/src/utils/canisterErrors.ts: Provides helpers to detect stopped-canister and authorization errors and returns user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/clipboard.ts: Implements a robust copy-to-clipboard function using modern and fallback methods.
frontend/src/utils/dateFormat.ts: Includes utilities for formatting dates for display, backend queries, and HTML date inputs.
frontend/src/utils/imageFile.ts: Validates image files, converts them to Uint8Array, and creates preview URLs with cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles extracting, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, containers, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the current project state, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for the marketing tracker app.
